what: UDS Battery Scores in Interactive Tables and Figures

title: UDS Battery Scores in Interactive Tables and Figures

code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("rmtrane/NpsychAssessmentTool") # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("rmtrane/NpsychAssessmentTool") pak::pak("rmtrane/NpsychAssessmentTool", dependencies = TRUE) remotes::install_github("rmtrane/NpsychAssessmentTool", dependencies = TRUE)

title: NpsychAssessmentTool: UDS Battery Scores in Interactive Tables and Figures — NpsychAssessmentTool-package

Assessment Longitudinal Table — assessment_longitudinal_table
text: Create table standardized scores across multiple visits

title: Assessment Longitudinal Table — assessment_longitudinal_table
code: assessment_longitudinal_table(   dat,   id = "NACCID",   date = "VISITDATE",   descriptions = c(Impaired = 0.03, Borderline = 0.1, `Low Average` = 0.26, Average =     0.76, `High Average` = 0.92, Superior = 0.97, `Very Superior` = 1),   fill_values,   methods = "infer",   table_font_size = 100,   table_id = NULL,   show_all_visits = TRUE,   stubhead_label = NULL )

title: Assessment Longitudinal Table — assessment_longitudinal_table
text: dat data.table object. id character string specifying column data frame dat. Default "NACCID". date character string specifying column data frame dat. Default "VISITDATE". descriptions named numeric vector. Default names "Impaired", "Borderline", "Low Average", "Average", "High Average", "Superior", "Superior" corresponding values 0.03, 0.10, 0.26, 0.76, 0.92, 0.97, 1. fill_values Optional. methods Either list containing methods used standardization (character vector named entried method version), "infer" (default). "infer", methods pulled attributes standardized columns. table_font_size numeric value passed gt::tab_options(table.font.size = gt::pct(table_font_size)). Defaults 100. table_id Optional. ID given table. provided, random string assigned. show_all_visits boolean. TRUE (default), visits present data shown table. FALSE, visits least one standardized score presented. stubhead_label Optional. Passed gt::tab_stubhead(label = stubhead_label).

title: Assessment Longitudinal Table — assessment_longitudinal_table
text: shiny::HTML table created gt::gt object.

what: Create NACC T-Cog Neuropsychological Assessment Summary Table — assessment_summary_table

text: function create summary table measures NACC T-Cog Neuropsychological Assessment.

title: Create NACC T-Cog Neuropsychological Assessment Summary Table — assessment_summary_table
code: assessment_summary_table(summary_dat, bar_height = 16)  assessment_summary_data(   dat,   id = "NACCID",   descriptions = c(Impaired = 0.03, Borderline = 0.1, `Low Average` = 0.26, Average =     0.76, `High Average` = 0.92, Superior = 0.97, `Very Superior` = 1),   fill_values = NULL,   methods = "infer",   include_caption = TRUE )

title: Create NACC T-Cog Neuropsychological Assessment Summary Table — assessment_summary_table
text: bar_height pixels. Height percentile bars. Default: 16 dat Data use. Must exactly one row (data one participant one visit). id Column containing ID. descriptions named vector giving cutoffs use creating descriptions. fill_values (optional) named vector length (names) descriptions hex color values use. NULL, colorcoding used. default, evenly spread colors red yellow green used. methods (optional) either list named entries specifying model used standardizing cognitive scores, character string "infer". latter, methods infered dat object using NpsychBatteryNorms::methods_from_std_data. specified, footnotes added indicate methods used. include_caption Logical; caption included table age IQCODEs current visit?

title: Create NACC T-Cog Neuropsychological Assessment Summary Table — assessment_summary_table

title: Updated from gtExtras::gt_plt_bar_pct — my_gt_plt_bar_pct
text: updates gtExtras::gt_plt_bar_pct handle missing values desired, avoid reliance dplyr

title: Updated from gtExtras::gt_plt_bar_pct — my_gt_plt_bar_pct
code: my_gt_plt_bar_pct(   gt_object,   column,   height = 16,   width = 100,   fill = "purple",   background = "#e1e1e1",   scaled = FALSE,   labels = FALSE,   label_cutoff = 0.4,   decimals = 1,   font_style = "bold",   font_size = "10px" )

title: Updated from gtExtras::gt_plt_bar_pct — my_gt_plt_bar_pct
text: gt_object existing gt table object class gt_tbl column column wherein bar plot replace existing data. height number representing vertical height plot pixels. Defaults 16 px. width number representing horizontal width plot pixels. Defaults 100 px. Importantly, interacts label_cutoff argument, want change cutoff, may need adjust width well. fill character representing fill bar, defaults purple. Accepts named color (eg 'purple') hex color. background character representing background filling 100% mark bar, defaults light grey. Accepts named color (eg 'white') hex color. scaled TRUE/FALSE logical indicating value already scaled percent max (TRUE) needs scaled (FALSE). Defaults FALSE, meaning value divided max value column multiplied 100. labels TRUE/FALSE logical representing labels plotted. Defaults FALSE, meaning value labels plotted. label_cutoff number, 0 1, representing set inside/outside label boundary. Defaults 0.40 (40%) column's maximum value. value row less cutoff, label placed outside bar, otherwise placed within bar. interacts overall width bar, happy placement labels may try adjusting width argument well. decimals number representing many decimal places used label rounding. Defaults 1. font_style character representing font style labels. Accepts one 'bold' (default), 'italic', 'normal'. font_size character representing font size labels. Defaults '10px'.

title: Plot Module — plotUI
text: UI displaying plots standardized scores across visits. Server logic handle creation updating plots show standardized scores across visits. Shiny app using plotUI plotServer.

title: Plot Module — plotUI
code: plotUI(id)  plotServer(   id = "Attention/Processing",   dat,   x_range = c("2016-05-01", "2020-08-01"),   y_range = c(-2.5, 2.5),   descriptions = c(Impaired = 0.03, Borderline = 0.1, `Low Average` = 0.26, Average =     0.76, `High Average` = 0.92, Superior = 0.97, `Very Superior` = 1),   fill_values = calc_fill_colors(n = 7),   print_updating = T,   shade_descriptions = TRUE,   new_id = NULL )  plotApp(dat_input = prepare_data(demo_data), studyids = NULL, testing = FALSE)

title: Plot Module — plotUI
text: id single string. Optional, defaults "Attention/Processing". one nacc_var_groups. dat data.table. participant specific. x_range date range character vector two elements. y_range numeric vector two elements. Optional, defaults c(-2.5, 2.5). descriptions named numeric vector. Optional, defaults vector described function definition. fill_values vector fill colors. Optional, defaults calc_fill_colors(n = 7). print_updating logical value. Optional, defaults TRUE. shade_descriptions logical value indicating plots shaded according regions given descriptions colors given fill_values. Optional, defaults TRUE. new_id Optional. String used table ID. NULL (default), random string assigned. dat_input data frame. Defaults prepare_data(demo_data). studyids Optional. NULL (default), use unique values dat_input$NACCID. testing Logical, whether run app testing mode.

title: Plot Module — plotUI
text: shiny::tagList object containing two shiny::conditionalPanel's: one plot, one text standardized scores found. wrapped bslib::accordion_panel inclusion main app. return value. shiny app.

title: Wrapper to prepare raw data — prepare_data
code: prepare_data(   dat,   selected_cols = c("RACE", "CDRGLOB", "MOCATOTS", "MOCBTOTS", "TRAILA", "TRAILARR",     "TRAILALI", "OTRAILA", "OTRLARR", "DIGFORCT", "DIGFORSL", "DIGBACCT", "DIGBACLS",     "WAIS", "MINTTOTS", "ANIMALS", "VEG", "UDSVERTN", "UDSVERFC", "UDSVERLC", "UDSBENTC",     "UDSBENTD", "CRAFTVRS", "CRAFTURS", "CRAFTDVR", "CRAFTDRE", "REY1REC", "REY2REC",     "REY3REC", "REY4REC", "REY5REC", "REY6REC", "REYDREC", "REYTCOR", "TRAILB",     "TRAILBLI", "TRAILBRR", "MOCACLOC", "MOCACLOH", "MOCACLON", "OTRAILB", "OTRLBRR",     "OTRLBLI", "NACCGDS", "CDRSUM",       "UDSBENRS", "NACCID", "SEX", "EDUC", "HANDED",     "NACCAGE", "BIRTHYR", "VISITYR", "VISITMO", "VISITDAY", "NACCUDSD", "NACCMMSE",     "BOSTON", "LOGIMEM", "MEMUNITS", "MEMTIME", "DIGIF", "DIGIFLEN", "DIGIB", "DIGIBLEN"),   methods = NULL,   print_messages = F,   with_diags = T )

title: Wrapper to prepare raw data — prepare_data
text: dat data set similar NACC data. example, see ?demo_data. selected_cols vector columns keep. named, names must correspond NACC variable names entries columns data set dat. methods NULL (default) list named entries specifying model use standardizing cognitive scores. NULL, defaults applied variables dataset methods implemented (see NpsychBatteryNorms::default_methods) print_messages logical; messages printed? TRUE (default), message print methods used methods omitted (NULL) with_diags logical (default TRUE); diagnoses included?

code: var_labels(   CDRSUM = NA,   TRAILARR = NA,   TRAILALI = NA,   TRAILBRR = NA,   TRAILBLI = NA,   UDSBENRS = NA,   UDSBENTD = NA,   UDSBENTC = NA,   REY1REC = NA,   REY2REC = NA,   REY3REC = NA,   REY4REC = NA,   REY5REC = NA,   REYTCOR = NA,   REYFPOS = NA,   CRAFTURS = NA,   CRAFTVRS = NA,   CRAFTDVR = NA,   CRAFTDRE = NA )

title: Create Labels for Assessment Summary Table — var_labels
text: CDRSUM Standard CDR sum boxes TRAILARR Number commission errors Trail Making Part TRAILALI Number correct lines Trail Making Part TRAILBRR Number commission errors Trail Making Part B TRAILBLI Number correct lines Trail Making Part B UDSBENRS Benson Complex Figure Recall - Recognized original stimulus among four options UDSBENTD Total score 10- 15-minute delayed drawing Benson figure UDSBENTC Total Score copy Benson figure REY1REC Rey AVLT Trail 1 total recall REY2REC Rey AVLT Trail 2 total recall REY3REC Rey AVLT Trail 3 total recall REY4REC Rey AVLT Trail 4 total recall REY5REC Rey AVLT Trail 5 total recall REYTCOR Rey AVLT delayed recognition; total correct REYFPOS Rey AVLT delayed recognition; total false positives CRAFTURS Craft Story 21 Recall (Immediate) - Total story units recalled, paraphrase scoring CRAFTVRS Craft Story 21 Recall (Immediate) - Total story units recalled, verbatim scoring CRAFTDVR Craft Story 21 Recall (Delayed) - Total story units recalled, verbatim scoring CRAFTDRE Craft Story 21 Recall (Delayed) - Total story units recalled, paraphrase scoring

title: Create Labels for Assessment Summary Table — var_labels
code: var_labels(   CDRSUM = 14,   TRAILARR = 0,   TRAILALI = 24,   TRAILBRR = 2,   TRAILBLI = 24,   UDSBENRS = 1,   UDSBENTD = 14,   UDSBENTC = 14,   REY1REC = -4,   REY2REC = -4,   REY3REC = -4,   REY4REC = -4,   REY5REC = -4,   REYTCOR = -4,   REYFPOS = -4,   CRAFTURS = 20,   CRAFTVRS = 12,   CRAFTDVR = 11,   CRAFTDRE = 13 ) #>               CDRGLOB MOCATOTS   MOCBTOTS                             NACCMMSE #> 1 CDR Global (14 SOB)     MoCA MoCA Blind Mini Mental State Examination (MMSE) #>                                    TRAILA #> 1 Trailmaking Part A (0 errors; 24/24 CL) #>                                     OTRAILA                          OTRLARR #> 1 Oral Trailmaking Part A - Completion Time Oral Trailmaking Part A - Errors #>                      DIGFORCT                          DIGFORSL #> 1 Number Span Forward - Total Number Span Forward - Span Length #>                       DIGBACCT                           DIGBACLS #> 1 Number Span Backward - Total Number Span Backward - Span Length #>                        DIGIF                         DIGIFLEN #> 1 Digit Span Forward - Total Digit Span Forward - Span Length #>                         DIGIB                          DIGIBLEN #> 1 Digit Span Backward - Total Digit Span Backward - Span Length #>                  WAIS MINTTOTS             BOSTON        ANIMALS #> 1 WAIS-R Digit Symbol     MINT Boston Naming Test Animal Fluency #>                 VEG  UDSVERTN UDSVERFC UDSVERLC           UDSBENTC #> 1 Vegetable Fluency F+L Words  F Words  L Words Benson Figure Copy #>                                    UDSBENTD                   CRAFTVRS #> 1 Benson Delay (100% retained; Recog = Yes) Craft Immediate - Verbatim #>                        LOGIMEM                    MEMUNITS #> 1 Logical Memory IA, Immediate Logical Memory IIA, Delayed #>                       CRAFTURS                              CRAFTDVR #> 1 Craft Immediate - Paraphrase Craft Delay - Verbatim (91% retained) #>                                  CRAFTDRE                              REYTOTAL #> 1 Craft Delay - Paraphrase (65% retained) RAVLT Total Learning (NA,NA,NA,NA,NA) #>                REYDLIST           REY6REC          REYDREC #> 1 RAVLT Distractor List RAVLT Short Delay RAVLT Long Delay #>                                         REYAREC #> 1 RAVLT Recognition (Correct: NA/15, FP: NA/15) #>                                    TRAILB          MOCACLOCK #> 1 Trailmaking Part B (2 errors; 24/24 CL) Clock Drawing Test #>                                     OTRAILB                          OTRLBRR #> 1 Oral Trailmaking Part B - Completion Time Oral Trailmaking Part B - Errors #>                        NACCGDS #> 1 GDS-15 (Depression Symptoms)

title: NpsychAssessmentTool 0.2.0
text: Multiple data sources can added combined. Added ability pull biomarker data directly Panda database (WADRC specific). part UI handles plots now uses accordion. lets user collapse panels plots interest less clutter. UDS 2.0 data can imported displayed (WADRC specific). Added option download main assessment table. Lots bug fixes improvements UI.
